newsitem.title: HONG KONG: China United mulls purchase of property.
newsitem.headline: China United mulls purchase of property.

text.p: Property investment and textiles group China United Holdings Ltd said on Monday it was considering buying commercial property in Hong Kong.
"The company received an offer from an independent third party to acquire an investment property from the group," the company's managing director Peter Lam said in the statement.
"The company is also considering to acquire three commercial units in Hong Kong," Lam said.
The statement said no agreements had yet been made in any of the transactions.
Its shares rose HK$0.01 to HK$0.365 in early trade.
